text.data: The Green Continent of Campbell Granbelos Fortress[end]P
Palpaleos: Asleep...[end]S
Sauzer: Palpaleos... There you are. You can't sleep either?[end]P
Palpaleos: No...[end]S
Sauzer: Don't worry about it. Can you feel it...? The legend we dreamed of is here, now.[end]P
Palpaleos: On this green continent of Campbell?[end]T
The legend we dreamed of...[end][0x0]

Sauzer: Yes... This girl will fulfill our dreams...
She will fulfill the legend.[end]N
No, it's rude of me to call her a girl. Princess [character][0x1] has become very beautiful.[end]P
Palpaleos... The day we leave is close at hand. Please rest.[end]P
Palpaleos...[end]L
Look at the sky...[end]T
The sky is ours. But not all of it.[end]S
Sauzer...[end]P
Palpaleos: The legend of the Holy Dragons...[end][0x0]
Sauzer: There is a legend... One spoken of in Kahna. Do you know of it?[end]S
Sauzer: Do you think I can do it?[end]D
Do you think I can become the man of legend?[end]I
I am the man who conquered the skies. If there are any battles before me, I will accept the challenge.[end]A
And then I will achieve victory![end]P
Palpaleos: Victory for a new era...[end]S
Sauzer: A new victory together. Always be at my side, Palpaleos.[end][end]
